messages.id: This feature allows you to recoup some of the costs of your event by asking your guests for donations.  This bot will not accept or handle any funds.  Instead, you will provide information, such as PayPal or Venmo addresses, to allow your guests to pay you.  Afterwards, they can click a button here to indicate that they have paid.  This is on the honor system.
messages.message: This feature allows you to recoup some of the costs of your event by asking your guests for donations.  This bot will not accept or handle any funds.  Instead, you will provide information, such as PayPal or Venmo addresses, to allow your guests to pay you.  Afterwards, they can click a button here to indicate that they have paid.  This is on the honor system.
messages.translation: Diese Funktion ermÃ¶glicht es Ihnen, einen Teil der Kosten Ihrer Veranstaltung durch Spenden Ihrer GÃ¤ste zu decken. Dieser Bot nimmt keine Zahlungen entgegen und verwaltet auch keine Gelder. Stattdessen geben Sie Informationen wie Ihre PayPal- oder Venmo-Adresse an, damit Ihre GÃ¤ste Ihnen direkt bezahlen kÃ¶nnen. AnschlieÃŸend kÃ¶nnen sie hier auf einen Button klicken, um die Zahlung zu bestÃ¤tigen. Dies basiert auf Vertrauen.

messages.id: First, how much money would you like to recoup via donations? Don't include the currency symbol. To disable, send 0

messages.id: How can people pay you?  Specify your PayPal, Venmo, Cashapp, Interac E-transfer, Zelle, or other credentials.  What you type here will be shown to your guests when they offer to donate.
messages.message: How can people pay you?  Specify your PayPal, Venmo, Cashapp, Interac E-transfer, Zelle, or other credentials.  What you type here will be shown to your guests when they offer to donate.
messages.translation: Wie kÃ¶nnen die Leute Sie bezahlen? Geben Sie Ihre PayPal-, Venmo-, Cash App-, Interac E-Transfer-, Zelle- oder andere Zahlungsinformationen an. Was Sie hier eingeben, wird Ihren GÃ¤sten angezeigt, wenn diese spenden mÃ¶chten.

messages.id:
Including your event in our public event directory makes it available to anyone in the local area.  Anyone can choose to attend or share your event.  We recommend you use this feature only for large events, as attendance can be hard to control.

If you would like to share your event in our directories, send a Location pin (usually via the ğŸ“ menu) that is close to where the event will take place. This allows nearby people to find your event.

Locals will be able to use the command /nearby to see events near them.
messages.message:
Including your event in our public event directory makes it available to anyone in the local area.  Anyone can choose to attend or share your event.  We recommend you use this feature only for large events, as attendance can be hard to control.

If you would like to share your event in our directories, send a Location pin (usually via the ğŸ“ menu) that is close to where the event will take place. This allows nearby people to find your event.

Locals will be able to use the command /nearby to see events near them.

Mit dem Befehl /nearby kÃ¶nnen sich lokale Personen Veranstaltungen in ihrer NÃ¤he anzeigen lassen.
